work.name: University of Washington, Health Promotion Research Center

awards.title: James R. Chen Award
awards.awarder: University of California, Berkeley, School of Information

awards.title: Renaissance Scholar Prize
awards.summary: USC recognizes Renaissance Scholars for excellance in 2 separate fields of study. I recieved $10,000 for graduate studies.

projects.name: The Hidden Emissions of Electric Vehicles
projects.summary: My project explains the sustainability of zero emissions vehicles and barries to EV adoption to the average consumer through a data driven storytelling website and an innovative vehicle lifetime emissions calculator, named Emissions Explorer.

projects.name: Startup Career Fair, SparkSC
projects.summary: I organized the largest student-led Startup Career Fair, connecting USC students with startups in LA. Recruited 53 startups and raised $16k from startup registration fees & on-campus career departments.
